```{css, echo=F, eval=T}
.tabs .tab a {
  color: rgba(46, 44, 44, 0.9);
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  padding: 0 2px;
  font-size: 14px;
  text-overflow: ellipsis;
  overflow: hidden;
  -webkit-transition: color .20s ease, background-color .20s ease;
  transition: color .25s ease-in, background-color .10s ease;
  font-size .25s ease;
}

.tabs .tab a:hover, .tabs .tab a.active {
  background-color: transparent;
  color: #1A0808;
  font-size: 20px;
  border: 2px inset rgba(26, 8, 8, 0.1);
}

.tabs .indicator {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  height: 5px;
  background-color: #1A0808;
  will-change: left, right;
}

.tabs .tab a:focus, .tabs .tab a:focus.active {
    background-color: rgba(26, 8, 8, 0.1);
    outline: none;
}

.material-icons{
  font-size: 20px;
  padding: 3px;
}

.test1{
  border-left: 1px solid black;
  margin-top: 3px; 
  position: relative;
  height: 250px;
}

.test2{
  border-right: 1px solid black;
  margin-top: 3px;
  padding-top: 3px; 
  height: 250px;
}

.tag1{
  top: 5px;
  padding: 5px 5px;
  background-color: #F5AB2D;
  border: 1px solid black;
  font-size: 2vw;
  border-radius: 50px;
  cursor: pointer;
}
```
